entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Monday 17 April 2023
